response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item, tailored to meet your specific needs and preferences, is worth $1,000,000 to you. I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price of $800,000, which I believe is a fair and advantageous deal for both parties involved.

Please consider this offer carefully. Should you decide to accept, you will be securing not only a valuable asset but also a partnership based on mutual respect and understanding. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 800000}
